name: Ch9BBaseConvo2
_source: speak;Gilliam;Fort Rigwald looms before us.|This won't be an easy assault.|What's your take on this, Garcia?
speak;Garcia;Hmm...reminds me of Castle Renvall.|That was a tough one.|We need to be more cautious this time.
speak;Gilliam;Castle Renvall didn't go smoothly?|Tell me what happened there.|We should learn from past mistakes.
speak;Garcia;Our initial approach was too direct.|We underestimated their defenses.
speak;Garcia;Ross nearly got himself killed charging ahead.
speak;Gilliam;That does sound concerning.|What would you suggest for Fort Rigwald?
speak;Garcia;We should split our forces.|One group to draw their attention to the main gate.|Another to distract the ballistas.
speak;Gilliam;The ballistas...|I think I can take their fire.|Simple, but effective.
speak;Seth;Gilliam, Garcia.|General Eirika wants your assessment of the situation.
speak;Gilliam;We were just discussing that, Sir Seth.|Garcia has some valuable insights from Castle Renvall.
speak;Garcia;The direct approach cost us at Renvall.|Fort Rigwald has similar defenses, but with one weakness.|Their outside forces are more spread out.
speak;Seth;I see.|And you're confident of this assessment?
speak;Garcia;As confident as a warrior can be before battle.|Nothing is certain, but it's our best chance.
speak;Gilliam;I agree with Garcia.|We could use my knights in heavy armor as the frontal distraction.|While the main force takes the gate.
speak;Franz;Reporting in!|Scouts confirm the outside troops are scattered.|Just as Garcia suggested!
speak;Garcia;Ha! This old warrior still has his wits about him!|My axe is ready when you are.
speak;Seth;Well done.|I'll inform General Eirika of your plan immediately.|Prepare your men.
speak;Gilliam;One more thing.|We should move at dawn.|Their forces should still be waking up.
speak;Garcia;Good thinking, Gilliam.|At Renvall, we attacked at midday.|The sun glinting off our armor gave away our position.
speak;Seth;Dawn it is, then.|Be ready by then.
speak;Gilliam;Garcia...|Thank you for sharing your experience.|It may save many lives today.
speak;Garcia;That's what veterans are for, my friend.|To ensure the mistakes of the past aren't repeated.|For our comrades, for Renais.
speak;Gilliam;For Renais.|Let's make this assault one for the history books.
speak;Garcia;Indeed!|My axe is hungry for battle!|And this time, I won't let Ross charge ahead alone!
speak;Gilliam;You've raised a fine warrior.|Impetuous, perhaps, but brave.|Much like his father.
speak;Garcia;Ha ha!|I'll take that as a compliment!|Now let's prepare.|Fort Rigwald awaits!
